name: Root Roundup
description:
Yee-Haw! It's time to round up the walking seeds that have invaded your farm. Jump up in the air to stomp them into the ground! Make sure it's dirt that you're planting them in, farmer.

Programming by:

Warren Degenhardt - https://github.com/wardeg5

Aaron Minnick  - https://github.com/aaronminnick

3D Modeling By:

Lily Owen -  https://yestea2.github.io/

3D Animation By:

Haylee Wagner https://www.artstation.com/hayleewagner

Music and Sound By:

Peter Karman -  https://ptrkrmn.com/ - @ptrkrmn
